mapper.select: select s.id, s.user_id, s.student_id, s.name, u.username, s.email, s.gender, s.grade, s.major, s.class, s.status, s.create_time from recruitment_batch rb left join stu_resume s on s.batch_id = rb.id and s.is_deleted = 0 and rb.is_deleted = 0 left join user u on s.user_id = u.id and s.is_deleted = 0 and u.is_deleted = 0 where rb.id = #{batchId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and s.id is not null and rb.is_deleted = 0 order by s.create_time asc
